quote: I may not have gone where I intended to go, but I think I have ended up where I intended to be.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Beware the fury of a patient man.
author: John Dryden

quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: All I need to make a comedy is a park, a policeman and a pretty girl.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: It is not love that should be depicted as blind, but self-love.
author: Voltaire

quote: You're only as good as your last haircut.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: We cannot change anything until we accept it. Condemnation does not liberate, it oppresses.
author: Carl Jung

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: An error doesn't become a mistake until you refuse to correct it.
author: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
author: Walter Hagen

quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
author: Confucius

quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
author: Brad Henry

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read.
author: Mark Twain

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
author: Henry Ford
